effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that increases your haste by 12% for 12 sec. Casting Summon Darkglare always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Hitting a Jackpot! also increases the damage of Unstable Affliction by 50% and causes Unstable Affliction to spread to up to 3 targets within 40 yds for 17 sec.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 4,496 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 660 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 373 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 93,491 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 140,244.

Equip: Your harmful and helpful spells have a chance to weave a Thread of Fate between you and your target for 5 sec. Tethered allies gain 5,264 bonus primary while the Thread holds and enemies take 360,876 Cosmic Damage when the Thread breaks.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ulthalesh, the Deadwind Harvester

name: Fate Weaver

spells.description: Use: Perform a weaving ritual, spinning the webs of fate and fashioning them into a Fateweaved Weapon.

description: Barely legible words are inscribed on the handle. "The ritual site lies in Azj-Kahet overlooking the Salien Gutters, far North of Rak-Zakaz."
